title: Virtual Pavilions
subtitle: Step into the cinematic 3Dsfera. Glide between floating product pods, zoom into supplier showcases, and discover your next deal in a convenient neon-lit, luxury environment.

floating.title: Floating Platforms
floating.body: Curated product platforms with immersive lighting and hover cues.

lighting.title: Cinematic Lighting
lighting.body: Neon gradients, glassmorphism, and subtle bloom for a luxury feel.

guided.title: Guided Tour
guided.body: Orbit controls, zoom, and info overlays to explore every product.

cta: Ready to integrate your own catalog? Connect your data, drop in GLB models, and go live with realtime chat.

hub.title: EXPO HUB
hub.instructions: CLICK CANVAS TO LOCK · WASD / ARROWS TO WALK · PRESS E TO INTERACT

techno.name: NEXUS SYSTEMS
techno.blurb: Neon-lit prototypes and immersive control decks.

lux.name: AURUM PRESTIGE
lux.blurb: Glass podiums for premium accessories and wearables.

mobility.name: VORTEX MOTORS
mobility.blurb: EV drivetrains, aero drones, and smart transit.

sustain.name: ECO SYNERGY
sustain.blurb: Clean tech, recycled composites, bio materials.

seller_dashboard.title: Seller Dashboard
seller_dashboard.subtitle: Manage your virtual presence.
seller_dashboard.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this pavilion?
seller_dashboard.select_conversation: Select a conversation to view details
seller_dashboard.upload_failed: Failed to upload file. Please try again.

pavilion_ui.controls_hint: SCROLL TO ZOOM · DRAG TO ROTATE · CLICK TO INSPECT
pavilion_ui.buyer_only_here: Chat is available to buyers only in this view.

showroom.order_contact_msg: Company manager will contact you soon.

calendar_ui.no_events: No upcoming exhibitions scheduled for this month.

welcome.title: VERIFIED PAVILION
welcome.subtitle: Welcome to the 3DSFERA Exhibition. Explore premium industrial suppliers, inspect verified machinery in 3D, and connect directly with manufacturers.
welcome.controls_hint: Use WASD to Walk • Click Items to Inspect

ui_nav.nav_inspect: Click product - Inspect - Open Info + Chat from panel

crane.title: HYDRAULIC CRANE
crane.desc: Heavy-duty mobile construction crane with 360-degree rotation.

valve.title: INDUSTRIAL VALVE
valve.desc: High-pressure flow control valve for pipeline infrastructure.

hq.title: 3DSFERA HQ
hq.desc: Global leader in industrial sourcing and AI-driven procurement logistics.

platform.title: 3DSFERA PLATFORM
platform.desc: AI-powered procurement dashboard. Visualize entire supply chains in real-time.

aero.title: W&T ENGINEERING
aero.desc: Aerospace-grade propulsion systems and turbine technology.

turbine_valve.title: TURBINE VALVE
turbine_valve.desc: Precision-engineered alloy valve for high-thrust turbine engines.

heavy.title: TITAN HEAVY INDUSTRIES
heavy.desc: Industrial crane and heavy lifting solutions for mega-projects.

robotic_arm.title: ROBOTIC ARM M-2000
robotic_arm.desc: High-payload industrial robotic arm for automated heavy assembly.

drone_a1.title: SCOUT DRONE A-1
drone_a1.description: High-speed autonomous scout monitoring perimeter security and crowd analysis.

drone_b2.title: HEAVY LIFTER B-2
drone_b2.description: Heavy-duty cargo drone capable of autonomous transport of exhibition materials.

drone_c3.title: INTERCEPTOR C-3
drone_c3.description: Rapid response drone meant for asset protection and unauthorized access prevention.

hq.title: 3DSFERA HQ
hq.description: The central hub for 3D innovation. Showcasing the future of volumetric rendering and holographic display tech.

crane.title: HEAVY CRANE X200
crane.description: Industrial grade hydraulic crane used for heavy lifting simulations.

arcade.title: ARCADE UNIT
arcade.description: Retro-fitted crane game machine with holographic prize display.

agri.title: HARVEST ROBOTICS
agri.description: Next-gen agricultural robotics and automated farming solutions.

pneumatic.title: ATMOS SYSTEMS
pneumatic.description: Advanced air pressure systems for large scale automation.

3dsfera.description: Leading digital marketplace connecting buyers and verified suppliers across 140 countries. Focused on industrial equipment, aerospace components, and heavy machinery.

aero.description: Specialized manufacturer of high-performance turbine engines and precision valves for aerospace and industrial applications.

heavy.description: Global leader in heavy machinery and industrial robotics, delivering lifting and automation solutions worldwide.

turbine_valve.title: High-Temp Turbine Valve
turbine_valve.description: Precision titanium-alloy valve engineered for extreme turbine temperatures and durability.

pneumatic_system.title: Industrial Pneumatic Actuator
pneumatic_system.description: Heavy-duty pneumatic control system for high-pressure airflow with rapid response.

robotic_arm.title: 6-Axis Industrial Robot
robotic_arm.description: High-precision robotic arm with strong payload capacity for automated manufacturing.

mobile_crane.title: Mobile Crane MC-500
mobile_crane.description: Hybrid diesel-electric mobile crane for all-terrain construction and industrial lifts.

hero.description: Access the world's first <1>Verified Industrial Metaverse</1>. Connect with suppliers, inspect heavy machinery in real-time 3D, and secure deals on the blockchain.

global_access.title: Global Access
global_access.desc: Seamlessly connect with manufacturers from over 140 countries without leaving your desk. The barrier to entry is gone.

real_time_3d.title: Real-Time 3D
real_time_3d.desc: Inspect intricate machinery with sub-millimeter precision using our proprietary WebGL rendering engine.

verified_trust.title: Verified Trust
verified_trust.desc: Every supplier is vetted, and every transaction is secured via smart contracts on the Ethereum blockchain.
